text: This oversized cotton textile, possibly a futonji (futon cover), exemplifies the boro technique where pieces of old textiles are recycled by patching them together. Each patch is reinforced with additional stitching using white cotton thread.
title: Patchwork (boro) bedding cover (futonji)
